quote: It is health that is real wealth and not pieces of gold and silver.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Health is a state of complete harmony of the body, mind, and spirit. When one is free from physical disabilities and mental distractions, the gates of the soul open.
author: B.K.S. Iyengar

quote: The good physician treats the disease; the great physician treats the patient who has the disease.
author: Sir William Osler

quote: Medicine is a science of uncertainty and an art of probability.
author: Sir William Osler

quote: Let food be thy medicine and medicine be thy food.
author: Hippocrates

quote: To keep the body in good health is a duty... otherwise we shall not be able to keep our mind strong and clear.
author: Buddha

quote: The art of healing comes from nature, not from the physician. Therefore, the physician must start from nature, with an open mind.
author: Paracelsus

quote: The best doctor gives the least medicines.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: He who has health, has hope; and he who has hope, has everything.
author: Thomas Carlyle

quote: Prevention is better than cure.
author: Desiderius Erasmus

quote: A healthy attitude is contagious but don’t wait to catch it from others. Be a carrier.
author: Tom Stoppard

quote: Physical fitness is the first requisite of happiness.
author: Joseph Pilates

quote: Sleep is that golden chain that ties health and our bodies together.
author: Thomas Dekker

quote: It is easier to change a man's religion than to change his diet.
author: Margaret Mead

quote: The body is like a piano, and happiness is like music. It is needful to have the instrument in good order.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: The groundwork of all happiness is health.
author: Leigh Hunt

quote: Health is not valued till sickness comes.
author: Thomas Fuller

quote: A fit body, a calm mind, a house full of love. These things cannot be bought – they must be earned.
author: Naval Ravikant

quote: Good health is not something we can buy. However, it can be an extremely valuable savings account.
author: Anne Wilson Schaef

quote: Your body hears everything your mind says.
author: Naomi Judd

quote: Healthy citizens are the greatest asset any country can have.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: When diet is wrong, medicine is of no use. When diet is correct, medicine is of no need.
author: Ayurvedic Proverb

quote: The natural healing force within each of us is the greatest force in getting well.
author: Hippocrates

quote: The greatest wealth is health.
author: Virgil

quote: Health is the thing that makes you feel that now is the best time of the year.
author: Franklin P. Adams

quote: Happiness is the highest form of health.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: Keeping your body healthy is an expression of gratitude to the whole cosmos – the trees, the clouds, everything.
author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote: Take care of your body. It’s the only place you have to live.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: The mind has great influence over the body, and maladies often have their origin there.
author: Molière

quote: Health is the crown on the well person’s head that only the ill person can see.
author: Robin Sharma

quote: Your health is what you make of it. Everything you do and think either adds to the vitality, energy, and spirit you possess or takes away from it.
author: Ann Wigmore

quote: Healing is a matter of time, but it is sometimes also a matter of opportunity.
author: Hippocrates

quote: To enjoy good health, to bring true happiness to one's family, to bring peace to all, one must first discipline and control one’s own mind.
author: Buddha

quote: You can't control what goes on outside, but you can control what goes on inside.
author: Unknown

quote: The preservation of health should be the first study of one who is of any worth to oneself, to one's family, and to one's country.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: Health requires healthy food.
author: Roger Williams

quote: Medicine sometimes snatches away health, sometimes gives it.
author: Ovid

quote: Walking is the best possible exercise. Habituate yourself to walk very far.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: An ounce of prevention is worth a pound of cure.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Time and health are two precious assets that we don't recognize and appreciate until they have been depleted.
author: Denis Waitley

quote: A sad soul can be just as lethal as a germ.
author: John Steinbeck

quote: To array a man's will against his sickness is the supreme art of medicine.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: I believe that the greatest gift you can give your family and the world is a healthy you.
author: Joyce Meyer

quote: True health is the art of observing our own body’s needs and responding to them.
author: Andrew Weil

quote: There is no medicine you can take that will replace what you can do for your own health.
author: Aarti Patel

quote: Health is a vehicle, not a destination.
author: Joshua Fields Millburn

quote: When health is absent, wisdom cannot reveal itself, art cannot manifest, strength cannot fight, wealth becomes useless, and intelligence cannot be applied.
author: Herophilus

quote: The doctor of the future will give no medicine, but will interest his patients in the care of the human frame, in diet, and in the cause and prevention of disease.
author: Thomas Edison

quote: Health is a relationship between you and your body.
author: Terri Guillemets

quote: A healthy outside starts from the inside.
author: Robert Urich

quote: Every time you eat or drink, you are either feeding disease or fighting it.
author: Heather Morgan

quote: Health is not about the weight you lose, but about the life you gain.
author: Dr. Josh Axe

quote: Healing is not linear.
author: Dr. Priyanka Wali

quote: You can’t pour from an empty cup. Take care of yourself first.
author: Norm Kelly

quote: Our bodies are our gardens – our wills are our gardeners.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Health is the first muse, and sleep is the condition to produce it.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: The doctor sees all the weakness of mankind; the lawyer all the wickedness, the theologian all the stupidity.
author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quote: Take care of your body. It’s the only place you have to live.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Healthy people are those who live in healthy homes on a healthy diet; in an environment equally fit for birth, growth, work, healing, and dying.
author: Ivan Illich

quote: In health there is freedom. Health is the first of all liberties.
author: Henri Frederic Amiel

quote: Health is not a luxury; it's a necessity.
author: Paul Farmer

quote: Your health and fitness are your biggest investments in your future.
author: Dr. John Berardi

quote: You don’t have to control your thoughts. You just have to stop letting them control you.
author: Dan Millman

quote: Self-care is not a luxury. Indeed, self-care is a necessity.
author: Audre Lorde

quote: Health is the foundation of all happiness.
author: Leigh Hunt

quote: The art of medicine consists of amusing the patient while nature cures the disease.
author: Voltaire

quote: True health is not just the absence of disease, but a state of vitality that enables us to thrive.
author: Dr. Mark Hyman

quote: There is no better pill than being healthy.
author: Ajahn Chah

quote: Medicine sometimes snatches away health, sometimes gives it.
author: Ovid

quote: If you are too busy to work out, your priorities need to be adjusted.
author: Dr. Mehmet Oz

quote: Wellness is the complete integration of body, mind, and spirit—the realization that everything we do, think, feel, and believe has an effect on our state of well-being.
author: Greg Anderson

quote: The purpose of the body is to carry the mind and spirit. Keeping it healthy is a way to honor life.
author: Taoist Proverb

quote: The only way to keep your health is to eat what you don’t want, drink what you don’t like, and do what you’d rather not.
author: Mark Twain

quote: The groundwork of all happiness is health.
author: Leigh Hunt

quote: The biggest disease today is not leprosy or tuberculosis, but rather the feeling of being unwanted.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: The food you eat can be either the safest and most powerful form of medicine or the slowest form of poison.
author: Ann Wigmore

quote: Doctors put drugs of which they know little into bodies of which they know less for diseases of which they know nothing at all.
author: Voltaire

quote: In minds crammed with thoughts, organs clogged with toxins, and bodies stiffened with neglect, there is just no space for anything else.
author: Alison Rose Levy
